channel.title: Cyberlaw on The Electronic Press
channel.description: Recent content in Cyberlaw on The Electronic Press

item.title: The 9/11 Commission is Massively, Completely and Catastrophically Wrong
item.description: Note from Steve (April 3, 2022): I’m leaving this up because it’s a thing I wrote once upon a time. In the intervening 7.5 years, some of my opinions have shifted. Some haven’t. And frankly I’m not sure about some of my textual interpretation here anymore. A post like this is best left to experts - not some 23-year-old. I still think “hacking back” is a terrible idea, but we’ve managed not to have a cyberattack turn into a shooting war.
